game.title: The Lost Crown
game.objective: Find the lost crown in the dragon's lair.
game.description: The king has been robbed of his precious crown during a feast. He suspects it was taken by a dragon that dwells deep in the mountains. Find and retrieve the crown to bring it back to the king.
game.reward: 10 gold pieces and a magic potion

task.objective: Speak to the hermit for information about the dragon's lair.
task.description: The wise old hermit lives near the entrance of the forest. He has been living there for centuries and knows many things about the mountain and its inhabitants. Speak to him to learn more about the dragon's lair.

location.name: The Hermit's Hut
location.description: A small, isolated cabin nestled near the forest entrance.
